clinical_study.brief_title: Prospective Clinical Investigation Comparing Standard Wound Closure Technique With Drains (Control) to Standard Wound Closure Techniques With TissuGlu® and No Drains (Test) in Mastectomy
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Clinical Investigation for a Randomized, Controlled, Multicenter Non-inferiority Study Comparing Standard Wound Closure Technique With Drains (Control) to Standard Wound Closure Techniques With TissuGlu® and No Drains (Test) in Mastectomy

brief_summary.textblock: Comparing standard wound closure technique with drains (control) to standard wound closure techniques with TissuGlu® and no drains (test) in mastectomy

detailed_description.textblock: A prospective, randomized, controlled, multicenter non-inferiority study comparing standard wound closure technique with drains (control) to standard wound closure techniques with TissuGlu® and no drains (test) in mastectomy. Patients will be enrolled for 90 Days from day of Surgery. It is expected that it will take 6-9 months for the full duration of the study including the 90 day follow up period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Cumulative drain volume, aspiration volume, and total wound drainage (drain volume + aspiration volume)
Cumulative days of treatment (with drains or aspiration)
Number of Clinically Relevant Seromas formation (number and aspiration volume)
Incidence and timing of initiation of adjuvant therapy related to the mastectomy procedure (such as radiation therapy, chemotherapy, endocrine therapy)

arm_group.description: Standard closure plus treatment with TissuGlu

intervention.intervention_name: Test - Standard Closure with TissuGlu Surgical Adhesive
intervention.description: Patients randomized into the Test group, TissuGlu® will be applied to the chest wall after removal of the breast tissue using the custom applicator during a standard mastectomy procedure followed by normal wound closure (suturing technique) without drain placement.
